subject: Automobile Racing
Traffic Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: A 13-car crash at the beginning of the Belgian Grand Prix that year was just a foretaste of the most accident-marred, topsy-turvy race ever at Spa-Francorchamps.
snippet: A 13-car crash at the beginning of the Belgian Grand Prix that year was just a foretaste of the most accident-marred, topsy-turvy race ever at Spa-Francorchamps.
